Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the country, the ideals he intensively wrote before his unexpected death at the age of 37, the ideology-based intellectual circles he moved around in, and the socio-political issues at the root of his activism.
